description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com
Diogo Moitinho de Almeida - Data scientist, software engineer, and hacker

ABSTRACT
We will start from the basics of deep learning: what it is, how it works, and how to get started, and then move to the most commonly used architectures including convolutional and recurrent networks. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7744

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Deep Learning - What is it and What It Can Do For You • Diogo Moitinho de Almeida
